text:
NYC - Paperless Post (Visa) / Onsite.

Sr. Software Developer - https://www.paperlesspost.com/about/jobs/479639

Paperless Post helps users create custom online and paper stationery through our elegant technologies and powerful design. Our customers pay us directly for a product they love and use for milestone events—like weddings and holidays—which means that we can focus on quality without having to answer to advertisers.
